TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridView extends Android.Widget.AbsListView

Docs.summary: A view that shows items in two-dimensional scrolling grid.

remarks.para: A view that shows items in two-dimensional scrolling grid. The items in the grid come from the ListAdapter associated with this view.
See the Grid View guide.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the adapter providing the grid's data
Docs.summary: Sets the data behind this GridView.

remarks.para: Sets the data behind this GridView.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the width of a column in the grid.

remarks.para: Return the width of a column in the grid.
This may not be valid yet if a layout is pending.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Describes how the child views are horizontally aligned.
Docs.value: the gravity that will be applied to this grid's children

remarks.para: Describes how the child views are horizontally aligned. Defaults to Gravity.LEFT
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the amount of horizontal spacing currently used between each item in the grid.
Docs.value: Current horizontal spacing between each item in pixels

remarks.para: Returns the amount of horizontal spacing currently used between each item in the grid.

This is only accurate for the current layout. If #setHorizontalSpacing(int) has been called but layout is not yet complete, this method may return a stale value. To get the horizontal spacing that was explicitly requested use #getRequestedHorizontalSpacing().
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int NumColumns { get; set; }
member this.NumColumns : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Get the number of columns in the grid.

remarks.para: Get the number of columns in the grid. Returns #AUTO_FIT if the Grid has never been laid out.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the requested width of a column in the grid.
Docs.value: The requested column width in pixels

remarks.para: Return the requested width of a column in the grid.
This may not be the actual column width used. Use #getColumnWidth() to retrieve the current real width of a column.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the requested amount of horizontal spacing between each item in the grid.
Docs.value: The currently requested horizontal spacing between items, in pixels

remarks.para: Returns the requested amount of horizontal spacing between each item in the grid.

The value returned may have been supplied during inflation as part of a style, the default GridView style, or by a call to #setHorizontalSpacing(int). If layout is not yet complete or if GridView calculated a different horizontal spacing from what was requested, this may return a different value from #getHorizontalSpacing().
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the gravity to apply to this grid's children

Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetSelection(int32 position) cil managed

Docs.param:
Index (starting at 0) of the data item to be selected.
If in touch mode, the item will not be selected but it will still be positioned appropriately.
